pages.text: $(item)Memory Essence/$ is a fluid which represents a player's memories and experiences in liquid form. It can be extracted and stored for later use, either for vanilla enchanting, or for certain $(pncr) crafting processes.$(p)There are two ways to obtain $(item)Memory Essence/$:$(li)1. With a $(l:tools/memory_stick)Memory Stick/$$(li)2. With an $(l:machines/aerial_interface)Aerial Interface/$.
